rpgonline

Class ColorUtils.SunColorGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpgonline.ColorUtils.SunColorGenerator
  • Enclosing class:
    ColorUtils

    public static class ColorUtils.SunColorGenerator
extends Object
    A system for generating sun colors at a specific time.
    Author:
    Tomas

public SunColorGenerator(float kelvin,
                                      float min,
                                      float mul)
        Deprecated. This uses scattering.
        Creates a generator based on various factors.
        Parameters:
        kelvin - The temperature of the sun.
        min - The minimum brightness.
        mul - The brightness multiplier for the distance from the sun.

      • SunColorGenerator

        @Deprecated
public SunColorGenerator(float kelvin,
                                      Color moon,
                                      float min,
                                      Atmosphere a,
                                      Atmosphere ma,
                                      float mul,
                                      float dist)
        Deprecated. This uses scattering.
        Creates a generator based on various factors.
        Parameters:
        kelvin - The temperature of the sun.
        min - The minimum brightness.
        mul - The brightness multiplier for the distance from the sun.
        dist - The distance from the sun.
        a - The atmospheric parameters for the surface of this world.
        ma - The atmospheric parameters for the surface of the moon.
        moon - The color of the moon.

      • SunColorGenerator

        public SunColorGenerator(Color sunlight,
                         Color moonlight,
                         Color sundown1,
                         Color sundown2,
                         Color night,
                         Color sunlightSky,
                         Color sundown1Sky,
                         Color sundown2Sky,
                         Color moonlightSky,
                         Color nightSky,
                         float sunSize)
        Creates a generator based on a set of colors.
        Parameters:
        sunlight - The color of light at noon.
        moonlight - The color of light at midnight.
        sundown1 - The color of light during early sundown / late sunrise.
        sundown2 - The color of light during late sundown / early sunrise.
        night - The color of light bat night.
        sunlightSky - The color of the sky at noon.
        sundown1Sky - The color of the sky during early sundown / late sunrise.
        sundown2Sky - The color of the sky during late sundown / early sunrise.
        moonlightSky - The color of the sky at midnight.
        nightSky - The color of the sky at night.
        sunSize - The size of the sun (1 is normal).
